hero.name: HARIF YASSINE
hero.title: Specialized Technician in Electromechanics of Automated Systems
hero.description: Passionate electromechanics engineer with expertise in automated systems, maintenance management, and industrial operations. Driven by innovation and precision.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a dedicated Electromechanics Technician specialized in Automated Systems with a strong foundation in industrial maintenance and operations. My experience spans across different sectors, from textile manufacturing to logistics operations at major facilities like Tanger Med.
about.paragraph2: I combine technical expertise with practical problem-solving skills, always striving for operational excellence and system optimization. My passion for technology extends beyond work, including graphic design and continuous learning.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: My educational journey has provided a solid foundation in technical expertise and scientific thinking.
education.description1: Advanced technical training in electromechanical systems, automation, industrial maintenance, and control systems.
education.description2: Secondary education with focus on scientific principles and analytical thinking.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey spans diverse industrial environments, from manufacturing to major logistics operations.
experience.description1: Specialized in logistics operations at one of Africa's largest ports, managing critical equipment and cargo operations.
experience.responsibility1_1: Handling, transfer, and loading of goods using specialized equipment
experience.responsibility1_2: Machine monitoring and operational reporting for optimal efficiency
experience.responsibility1_3: Organizing and recording moved products with precision tracking
experience.responsibility1_4: Ensuring safety protocols and equipment maintenance standards
experience.description2: Operated and maintained industrial machinery in a manufacturing environment, focusing on operational excellence and problem-solving.
experience.responsibility2_1: Repaired technical problems on production machines
experience.responsibility2_2: Maintained smooth factory operations and production flow
experience.responsibility2_4: Collaborated with technical teams for system optimization

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Showcasing my graphic design work including textile printing, embroidery patterns, and print-on-demand designs for various clients and projects.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive overview of my technical competencies and areas of expertise.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to collaborate or discuss opportunities? I'd love to hear from you. Let's connect and explore how we can work together.
contact.downloadCVSubtitle: Get the complete overview of my experience, education, and skills.
